name: game_uuid
description: Unique game identifier (primary key; hide in sheet)

name: end_reason
description: Reason game ended (loser result or draw reason)

name: # Secondary (Games_Meta) — computed/stored but not in main sheet
eco_url
description: Opening reference URL from JSON (if available)

name: start_dt
description: Local start datetime (from start_time or PGN UTC)

name: type
description: Derived type: daily if time_class is daily; else live

name: url_numeric_id
description: Numeric id parsed from end of url (meta only)

name: match_link
description: Published Data API team match link (optional)

name: white.rating
description: White rating at time of game

name: white.id
description: Published Data API player URL for white

name: black.rating
description: Black rating at time of game

name: black.id
description: Published Data API player URL for black

name: my_id
description: My Published Data API player URL

name: opp_id
description: Opponent Published Data API player URL

name: clock_times
description: Post-move clock times aligned to SAN (single-quoted JSON)

name: time_spent
description: Per-move time spent aligned to SAN (single-quoted JSON)
